description:
The Fitch Law Firm is a personal injury firm that has proudly served the people of Ohio for over three decades. Our law firm began in Columbus with the goal of serving the people of Central Ohio. Thanks to our proven record of success, we have expanded and now serve victims of negligence from all across the state from our five office locations, including the one in Independence, which serves the residents of the Cleveland area and surrounding northeastern Ohio who have legal needs due to the following:

  • Personal injury, including car, truck and motorcycle accidents and traumatic brain injuries (TBI)
  • Medical malpractice, including defective drugs and medical devices
  • Sexual abuse

Attorney John Fitch founded our firm to ensure victims of negligence and abuse had access to high-quality legal representation. Mr. Fitch has dedicated his career to that goal, and, thanks to his dedication, he has won numerous settlements and verdicts for his clients. In fact, his success has earned him membership in the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum. Membership in this association is limited to lawyers who have won more than $2 million for a client in a jury verdict or settlement.

If you suffered injuries because of another person's negligence or you are a victim of sexual abuse, The Fitch Law Firm can help you pursue compensation for your suffering. We will stand beside you throughout the legal process and provide guidance and support all along the way. To learn more about the benefits of choosing our law firm, you can take advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation.
